overview: I was born in Trento in 1982, I received the B.Sc and the M.Sc. degree in Telecommunication Engineering (summa cum laude) from the University of Trento, Trento, in 2004 and 2006 respectively. In 2004 I was an intern at European Space Agency Research Institute, Rome (Italy). I’m now attending the B.Sc. in Theoretical Physics at the same university. I’m a member of the LION Research Group (at DISI laboratory for machine Learning and Intelligent OptimizatioN) and my main interests are in the area of reactive search optimization, in particular applied to advanced distributed location-aware recommendation systems, to traffic flow simulation and to services related to traffic and mobility. I am also CEO at Reactive Search Srl, the company that implements the reactive search optimization.
